meanings: wonderful, nice, cool, splendid, lovely, (informal) great, (informal) fabulous; (옷차림 등이) fashionable, stylish, chic

vlive.korean: [멋진 휴지 불기였다...] 형, 마음이 왜 아프냐? [Nice try.] Why does it hurt my heart? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.110
vlive.english: [Nice try.] Why does it hurt my heart?

vlive.korean: 스테이들은 다 안다니까! - 창빈이 형의 멋진 팥이 여기 있네! STAY knows everything! - CHANGBIN's great red beans are here! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 스키즈 옥상토크🍧💕
vlive.english: STAY knows everything! - CHANGBIN's great red beans are here!

vlive.korean: [잘생긴 유겸 귀여운 유겸 멋진 유겸...] 달겸이 인스타 올라왔어요? [Handsome YUGYEOM, cutie pie YUGYEOM, cool YUGYEOM...] Dalkyum's Instagram is updated? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [GOT7] 왜요..? 제가 재채기도 말랑깜찍하게 하는 김유겸 팬처럼 생겼나요..? (YUGYEOM answering fans’ questions)
vlive.english: [Handsome YUGYEOM, cutie pie YUGYEOM, cool YUGYEOM...] Dalkyum's Instagram is updated?

vlive.korean: 내일 아침에 갈 거야 - 아주 멋진 노래를 만들고 와보지 - 언니 안 가요? 언니 가요? I'll leave tomorrow morning. - I'll comeback making a great song. - You're not leaving? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🐱🐹🐿🦋🍞🐰
vlive.english: I'll leave tomorrow morning. - I'll comeback making a great song. - You're not leaving?

vlive.korean: [컴퓨터 50만 원짜리면 멋진 문서 작업 가능] - 안 받습니다 - 게임 아무것도 못할걸요? [You can only use it for documentation] - I won't receive it. - You won't be able to play games. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107
vlive.english: [You can only use it for documentation] - I won't receive it. - You won't be able to play games.

examples.korean: She has some lovely pieces of jewellery. 발음듣기 그녀는 멋진 보석류 몇 가지를 가지고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She has some lovely pieces of jewellery. 발음

examples.korean: He equalized with a beautifully flighted shot. 발음듣기 그가 멋진 샷을 날려 동점을 만들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He equalized with a beautifully flighted shot. 발음

examples.korean: a glorious trip to Rome 발음듣기 정말 멋진 로마 여행 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a glorious trip to Rome 발음

examples.korean: She turned on her elegantly shod heel. 발음듣기 그녀는 멋진 구두를 신고 뒷굽으로[뒷굽에 체중을 싣고] 빙그르르 돌았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She turned on her elegantly shod heel. 발음

examples.korean: The house had a panelled hall and a fine oak stair. 발음듣기 그 집에는 벽판으로 장식된 홀과 멋진 오크 계단이 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The house had a panelled hall and a fine oak stair. 발음
